hero.title: AWS Student
hero.description: Join us for a full day of learning, networking, and innovation! Discover the latest AWS technologies through hands-on workshops, inspiring talks, and connect with fellow cloud enthusiasts.

about.title: What is a Student
about.description: Student Community Days (SCDs) are one-day, student-led events designed to bring together cloud enthusiasts, developers, and tech professionals. These events feature multiple learning tracks, hands-on workshops, inspiring talks, and networking opportunities - all focused on AWS technologies and cloud computing innovation.

learn.title: Learn by Doing
learn.description: Participate in hands-on workshops and labs designed to give you practical experience with AWS services.

network.title: Network & Connect
network.description: Meet like-minded students, professionals, and AWS experts. Build connections that last beyond the event.

recognition.title: Earn Recognition
recognition.description: Get certificates of participation and learn about AWS certification paths to advance your career.

tracks.title: Choose Your
tracks.description: Dive deep into AWS technologies with our three specialized tracks. Each track offers hands-on workshops, expert talks, and practical labs designed for different skill levels.

track1.title: Cloud Fundamentals
track1.description: Perfect for beginners! Learn the basics of cloud computing, AWS core services, and get hands-on experience with fundamental AWS tools.

intro.title: Introduction to AWS
intro.description: Core services overview and AWS console navigation

ec2.title: EC2 Hands-on Lab
ec2.description: Launch and configure your first virtual server

storage.title: Storage Solutions
storage.description: S3, EBS, and data management best practices

security.title: Security Basics
security.description: IAM, security groups, and access management

track2.title: DevOps & Automation
track2.description: Dive into modern DevOps practices with AWS. Learn CI/CD, infrastructure as code, and automation tools to streamline your development workflow.

track3.title: AI/ML & Data
track3.description: Explore the cutting-edge of AI and machine learning on AWS. Build intelligent applications and work with big data analytics tools.

sagemaker.title: SageMaker Workshop
sagemaker.description: Build and deploy ML models at scale

selection.title: Track Selection
selection.description: You can attend sessions from multiple tracks throughout the day. Choose your primary track during registration.

bring.title: What to Bring
bring.description: Bring your laptop with AWS CLI installed. We'll provide AWS credits and detailed setup instructions.

certificates.title: Certificates
certificates.description: Complete any track to receive a certificate of participation and AWS learning resources.

speakers.title: Learn from
speakers.description: Our speakers are AWS experts, industry professionals, and thought leaders who will share their knowledge and experience with you.

cta.title: Want to be a Speaker?
cta.description: We're always looking for passionate speakers to share their knowledge with our community.

sponsors.title: Powered by
sponsors.description: We're grateful to our sponsors who make this event possible and support the growth of the cloud computing community.

aws.title: Amazon Web Services
aws.description: Leading cloud platform providing the infrastructure for this event

becomeSponsors.title: Your Company Here
becomeSponsors.description: Join us in supporting the next generation of cloud professionals

cta.title: Interested in Sponsoring?
cta.description: Help us make this event even better and reach more students

register.title: Ready to Join Us?
register.description: Don't miss this incredible opportunity to learn, network, and grow your cloud skills. Registration is completely free, but seats are limited!

benefits.admission: Free admission to all tracks and workshops

form.title: Register Now
form.subtitle: Secure your spot at AWS Student Community Day

checkboxes.terms: I agree to the Terms and Conditions
checkboxes.updates: Subscribe to AWS Cloud Club updates

form.footer: Registration closes on March 10, 2024 or when capacity is reached.

brand.title: AWS Cloud Club
brand.subtitle: Universidad de Antioquia
brand.description: Empowering students to build the future with cloud technologies.
